definition: Daya Bay
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
Asia/Asian/Taiwan pr. [Ya3]
second/next to/inferior/sub-/Taiwan pr. [ya3]
bay/gulf/to cast anchor/to moor (a boat)

sentences.english: The number of project staff residing in Huiyang, Aotou and Daya Bay will also rise.
sentences.chinese: 居住在惠陽和大亞灣的項目員工也會增多。

sentences.english: The paper conducts an exploratory study on radioecology at Daya Bay.
sentences.chinese: 本文對大亞灣海域放射生態學進行了有益的探索。

sentences.english: Situated on a quiet "island" in the crowded city, Yujingwan Garden boasts of its unique geographic position.
sentences.chinese: 大亞灣“渝景灣花園”鬧中取靜，地理位置得天獨厚。

sentences.english: In 1984, EDF became the technology contractor of Daya Bay Nuclear Power Station construction;
sentences.chinese: 1984年擔任大亞灣核電站建設的技術總承包。

sentences.english: This is a report on earthquake monitoring system for Daya Bay Nuclear Power Plant.
sentences.chinese: 本文是對大亞灣核電廠地震檢測系統的一份考查報告。
